sleep_478.title: 478 Breathing Exercise | Sleep & Relaxation
sleep_478.description:
The 4-7-8-0 breathing technique supports calm and regulation through a balanced inhale, hold, and exhale pattern. By following this guided rhythm, the nervous system shifts toward parasympathetic activation, helping reduce stress, improve focus, and support emotional clarity.

This pattern may be helpful for grounding, relaxation, and creating space between thoughts. Suitable for breathwork beginners and anyone seeking a simple, science-informed calming practice.

Keywords: breathing technique, breathwork, nervous system regulation, calm, stress relief, guided breathing, 4-7-8-0 pattern.
